A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is the best star wars movie since Empire strikes back. I really don't  know why there is a terrible audience score\,this is a fantastic star wars movie. It show us more of the dark side\, and what It can do to people who are seduced by it. The cast is charming and grand Especially Mark Hamils performance as Luke Skywalker\, he nailed it. The score is better then previous star wars movies\, the visual effects are great looking\, and this movie is actually funny at times\, and has every right to be.
